name: Chernobyl (itch) (ZAMANIAC Games)
description:
A survival arcade game taking place after the Chernobyl disaster. This is a submission for the Fitchburg State University Fall 2021 Game Jam, under the theme "Adaption". It is a proof of concept that we may return to someday.
THIS PROJECT IS A WORK-IN-PROGRESS, IT WILL BE UPDATED SOON! 

CREDITS

Zachary Shirikjian - Assistant Programmer/UI Designer/Artist

Samuel Hilty - Background Artist/Lead Game Designer

Rob Kell - Lead Programmer
